name: David Gronda
description: Well I have been blessed with wonderful friends and family. I like to make people laugh. I take care of myself ,I eat healthy and exercise. I’m what people call these day’s as ‘metro’ . , I open doors, pull out chairs, stuff like that. I treat a woman with respect and I want to be treated with respecte in return. I’m looking for a companion, a wife and a best friend. I know what I want and what I don’t.I like a woman that takes care of her appearance, knows how to communicate and has a beautiful smile, loves to laugh, be affectionate, flirtatious and prayerful. . .. So I had to put them first in my life and haven’t had much of a social life.
